topic_list.topic: Desired features of the new remote controls
Emphasizing good looks and sizes of TV remote controls

general_query_list.answer: The meeting was mainly about the exchange of the preliminary ideas about a new TV remote control project and subsequent task assignment. The project manager first set a target of making a fifty million Euros' profit from the project, with the unit price of twenty-five Euros. Afterwards, the team raised different opinions about features of the new remote controls and related questions about market potential. Among all the features, having a good look and size was unanimously considered to be the most essential. In the end, Marketing was assigned to investigate market competition and design, and User Interface thinking about shapes, colours and other attributes which would attract customers.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about desired features of the new remote controls.
specific_query_list.answer: The team came up with three general desired features about their new TV remote controls. First, it should be universal (which was the one for all type things). Second, the remote controls were required to be slim. Most importantly, it should be different from the rest in the market, suggesting that the new remote controls would be with some kinds of a gimmick, such as whistling for retrieval.

specific_query_list.query: Why did the team discuss the desired features of the new TV remote controls?
specific_query_list.answer: There were two reasons. The first was that the unit price of each remote control was relatively high (twenty-five Euros). Therefore, in order to increase customers' willingness to spend so much money on one single remote control, the features must be satisfying and good enough. The second was the competition since there were other TV remote controls in the market. The new TV remote controls shall be special and different from the rest so as to attract customers.

specific_query_list.query: How did the team come up with these features of the new TV remote controls?
specific_query_list.answer: Basically, they summarized from their daily experience. The project manager pointed out the User Interface only bought the sort of one for all type things. Also, the User Interface and project manager both agreed that a little gimmick was able to make a difference. For example, you could whistle to retrieve lost items.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the importance of good looks and sizes of remote controls.
specific_query_list.answer: In the discussion, the team agreed that the good look and size were two vital features of the new TV remote controls. Unfortunately, the team failed to reach a consensus in this meeting about the size, but they left it to the next meeting.

specific_query_list.query: Why did the team agree that a good look was important to the new TV remote controls?
specific_query_list.answer: According to Marketing, people were more willing to play with a good-looking remote control when they were watching movies or playing electronic devices. The rest of the team approved of this idea since people tended to have a good design in hand.

specific_query_list.query: Why did the team couldn't think of the satisfying size of the new TV remote controls?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer pointed out that too many buttons would get the remote controls too big and clunky. However, a really small and slim one was very likely to be lost. The User Interface then proposed a PDA or hand-held kind of remote controls. Unfortunately, it was not friendly to the unit price.
